Name: 
Lê Duy Hoàng. 
Date of birth: 
02/08/1993. 
University: 
University of Sciences. 
Address: 
106 Trần Nhân Tôn, P.2, Q.10, HCM. 
Email:  hoangld.dev@gmail.com 
Skype: hoangld_dev. 
Current position:
Senior Software Engineer. 
Phone:
0963 246 516. 
About: 
➢Over 5 years develop mobile application. 
➢Build and maintain over 20 apps (10+ apps build from beginning) for many clients and companies. 
➢Good at researching for every complex problems even there are little informations on internet. 
➢Always be a key member or top developer of companies. 
Study Process: 
➢2011 - 2015: Complete bachelor of science in software engineering - University of Sciences. 
➢2013 - 2014: Complete basic and advanced mobile development courses. 
Experience ​ : 
➢Mobile development: 
▪
Android: 
9/10. (5+ years). 
▪
IOS: 
7/10. (1.5+ years). 
▪
Ionic, React native:
6/10. (6 months). 
➢ Language:  
▪
Java:
9/10. (5+ years) 
▪
Kotlin:
7/10. (6+ months) 
▪
HTML/CSS/Javascript: 
6/10. (6 months) 
▪
Objective C, Swift: 
7/10. (1.5+ years) 
▪
C, C++, C#: 
5/10. (6 months) 
➢Web development: 
▪
PHP (Laravel, Slim): 
5/10. (6 months) 
▪
.Net: 
5/10. (6 months) 
ZaloPay (4/2019 - 7/2019) 
Position: 
Senior Mobile Developer. 
Link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vn.com.vng.zalopay 
Tools:
Android studio, Zeplin, CI/CD, Gitlab, LabelImg, Jupyter,... 
Responsibilities:
Maintain and develop some features make app have good performance and more 
security. Research new technology to apply for smart payment, refactor and improve 
architecture for base source 
Technical: 
Activity, Fragment, Intent, JobIntentService, Dagger, Rx-Android, RX-Kotlin, Kotlin, 
Gson, Retrofit, MVP, PowerMock, Clean Architect, ZXing, Camera, Image classification,  
Object detection, Tensorflow, Python, Mobilenet, R-CNN,... 
Streamy (2/2018 – 3/2019) 
Description: Streamy support user find event and join by buy the ticket on app and website. User can 
create a event and sell the ticket on, looking for events around by searching. In beside that, Streamy is a 
social app too, user can connect with others by using app like: Facebook, Instagram,... by features: find 
friend, add friend, chat, create story, live streaming,... 
Position: 
Senior Android Developer. 
Link ​ : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.live.streamy 
Tools:
Android studio, Zeplin, Trello 
Responsibilities:
Ensure Streamy Android application is created and have great operation. 
Technical: 
Wowza cloud service, Wowza Gocoder, edit photo, edit video (FFmpeg), Intent 
Service, Broadcast Receiver, Content Provider, Facebook SDK, Javascript interface 
for SVG seat map, Firebase, FCM, Fabric, RX-Android, Android annotation, Retrofit, 
                                Dagger, MVP, Material design,... 
FPT Software (5/2014 – 7/2014 and 9/2016 – 2/2017) 
Position: 
Senior Android developer 
Project: 
Alermo, DirectTV App (DVR), Pill Reminder, OTT,… 
Link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.alermo 
                                https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.directv.dvrscheduler 
                                https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bayer.ph.Horadelapildora 
Client: 
RaKuten, DirectTV, Bayer. 
Responsibilities: Get requirement -> Confirm requirement -> estimate tasks -> confirm manager/client  
-> Coding -> testing -> release (Alpha) -> QA -> maintenance -> release (Beta). 
Technical: 
Sliding menu, pull to refresh, load more, Asynctask, Viewpager, streaming, video 
player, SQlite, 
data binding, event bus, Task-schedule, Activity, Fragment, Intent, Broadcast receiver, 
Service, MVVM 
Company: ISB VietNam (09/ 2014 – 12/2015) 
Address: 
Unit 3.1, Etown 2, 364 Cong Hoa St, Tan Binh Dist., Ho Chi Minh.
Position: 
Software engineer (Android). 
Project: 
IWnn-IME (Keyboard), Prospex (Smart watch), MyTrax (Music app) 
Link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.omronsoft.wnnlab 
Client: 
Sonny, Docomo, Omron, Panasonic, Seiko. 
Tools: 
Android studio, Git, Jira. 
Responsibilities: Get requirement -> Confirm requirement -> estimate tasks -> confirm manager/client  
-> Coding -> testing -> release (Alpha) -> QA -> maintenance -> release (Beta). 
Technical: 
Input service, Plugin, Software-hardware keyboard, emotion icon, animation, SQlite, 
Bluetooth low energy, Activity, Intent, Fragment, Google Map, Service, Alarm 
manager, Service, Notification.
